Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication

Class RMIRespondServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication.ResponseServer
it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication.RMIRespondServer
public class RMIRespondServer extends ResponseServer
This class is used to implement the ResponseServer necessary to the RMIServerApp
